metadata.synopsis: One-liner and HasMet for the vampire book club member02 in the Park. Its a vampire book club as in they read vampire books. They aren't vampires. Probably.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to one of the book club members in the CTY_Main_A Park at coords -92, 30, -50

0.speaker: Caerdwyn
0.text: You should join us next time for the Book Brigade! Not sure what we're reading, though.

1.speaker: Caerdwyn
1.text: Tell you what, I really enjoyed our book this month. Dusk's Dark Desires - highly recommend it.

2.speaker: Caerdwyn
2.text: That was nothing like the violence I've read about... It was horrid.
